column1: Table 1221: Passenger journeys by sector, Great Britain, April 1994 to June 2025
This worksheet contains two tables presented vertically, with one blank row between tables. The first table shows annual data and the second table shows quarterly data.
Some cells refer to notes which can be found on the notes worksheet.
Some shorthand is used in this table, [b] = break in time series, [p] = provisional data, [z] = data not applicable
